title: Olives don't float
creator_credit: Edwin Moses, Peter McKinley, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Peter Cummins plays an experienced seafarer who surveys the people and boats in the bay and points out the good and bad safety features of the various craft, their pilots and passengers. Production Manager: Penny Chapman. Cast includes: Frank Banset, Ray Sangston, Nino Ceron, Peter Eldridge, Jan Kuplis, Christine Ellison, Peter McKinley, Sven Kuplis, Julian Harvey, Peter Lewis.
